statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={150.7}{e}^{{{0.0484}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0484}}\approx{1.0495904075314}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0495904075314}-{1}={0.049590407531445}\approx{0.0496} and the percent is 4.96.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
